attributes.action: Make the UK a sovereign nation again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parliamentary sovereignty is defined as the idea that Parliament is the highest authority in the land and that its power cannot be questioned.
But since the EU can now overide Parliament, we do not class as a sovereign nation anymore.
We would like this to be changed so that we can be sovereign and free from foreign powers again.
Alternatively you could at least be honest and refer to the UK as a powerless state or province, which it now is.
